--- id: ls04 cost: $10.00 paypal_id: LHNDZ9JL2E2KA product_name: Landsknecht Armbrustschützen (Crossbowmen) photoset_id: 72157685793370086 local_nav_weight: 140 short_title: Armbrustschützen (Crossbowmen) title: 10mm Landsknecht Armbrustschützen (Crossbowmen) ---

Landsknechte Doppelsöldner armed with crossbows would lay ranged fire support by the flanks of the pike squares.

This is a Armbrustschützen (Crossbowmen) unit of fifteen strips of two figures each (30 figures total). You will recieve fifteen rank and file strips (a mix of ls04a–e). Bases are not included.

Sculpted by Bob Naismith and cast by D & D Model Cleaning & Casting in lead free pewter.
